servicePlans.name: aws
servicePlans.description: Select Amazon Web Services as the cloud provider where your Kyma cluster is deployed.

additionalWorkerNodePools.description: Specifies the list of additional worker node pools.

autoScalerMax.description: Specifies the maximum number of virtual machines to create.

autoScalerMin.description: Specifies the minimum number of virtual machines to create.

haZones.description: Specifies whether high availability (HA) zones are supported. This setting is permanent and cannot be changed later. If HA is disabled, all resources are placed in a single, randomly selected zone. Disabled HA allows setting both autoScalerMin and autoScalerMax to 1, which helps reduce costs. It is not recommended for production environments. When enabled, resources are distributed across three zones to enhance fault tolerance. Enabled HA requires setting autoScalerMin to the minimal value 3.
haZones.title: HA zones

machineType.description: Specifies the type of the virtual machine.

name.description: Specifies the unique name of the additional worker node pool. The name must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-', must start and end with an alphanumeric character, and can be a maximum of 15 characters in length.

administrators.description: Specifies the list of runtime administrators
administrators.title: Administrators

autoScalerMax.description: Specifies the maximum number of virtual machines to create

autoScalerMin.description: Specifies the minimum number of virtual machines to create

machineType.description: Specifies the type of the virtual machine.

modules.description: Use default modules or provide your custom list of modules. Provide an empty custom list of modules if you don’t want any modules enabled.

default.description: Check the default modules in the default modules table.
default.title: Use Default

list.description: Check a module technical name on this website. You can only use a module technical name once. Provide an empty custom list of modules if you don’t want any modules enabled.

channel.description: Select your preferred release channel or leave this field empty.

_enumDisplayName.CreateAndDelete: CreateAndDelete - default module resource is created or deleted.
_enumDisplayName.Ignore: Ignore - module resource is not created.

customResourcePolicy.description: Select your preferred CustomResourcePolicy setting or leave this field empty.

networking.description: Networking configuration. These values are immutable and cannot be updated later. All provided CIDR ranges must not overlap one another.

clientID.description: The client ID for the OpenID Connect client.

groupsClaim.description: If provided, the name of a custom OpenID Connect claim for specifying user groups.

issuerURL.description: The URL of the OpenID issuer, only HTTPS scheme will be accepted.

signingAlgs.description: Comma separated list of allowed JOSE asymmetric signing algorithms, for example, RS256, ES256

usernameClaim.description: The OpenID claim to use as the user name.

usernamePrefix.description: If provided, all usernames will be prefixed with this value. If not provided, username claims other than 'email' are prefixed by the issuer URL to avoid clashes. To skip any prefixing, provide the value '-' (dash character without additional characters).

name.description: Specifies the unique name of the additional worker node pool. The name must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-', must start and end with an alphanumeric character, and can be a maximum of 15 characters in length.

servicePlans.name: gcp
servicePlans.description: Select Google Cloud as the cloud provider where your Kyma cluster is deployed.

additionalWorkerNodePools.description: Specifies the list of additional worker node pools.

autoScalerMax.description: Specifies the maximum number of virtual machines to create.

autoScalerMin.description: Specifies the minimum number of virtual machines to create.

haZones.description: Specifies whether high availability (HA) zones are supported. This setting is permanent and cannot be changed later. If HA is disabled, all resources are placed in a single, randomly selected zone. Disabled HA allows setting both autoScalerMin and autoScalerMax to 1, which helps reduce costs. It is not recommended for production environments. When enabled, resources are distributed across three zones to enhance fault tolerance. Enabled HA requires setting autoScalerMin to the minimal value 3.
haZones.title: HA zones

It is not recommended for production environments. When enabled, resources are distributed across three zones to enhance fault tolerance. Enabled HA requires setting autoScalerMin to the minimal value 3.
haZones.title: HA zones

machineType.description: Specifies the type of the virtual machine.

name.description: Specifies the unique name of the additional worker node pool. The name must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-', must start and end with an alphanumeric character, and can be a maximum of 15 characters in length.

administrators.description: Specifies the list of runtime administrators
administrators.title: Administrators

autoScalerMax.description: Specifies the maximum number of virtual machines to create

autoScalerMin.description: Specifies the minimum number of virtual machines to create

machineType.description: Specifies the type of the virtual machine.

clientID.description: The client ID for the OpenID Connect client.

groupsClaim.description: If provided, the name of a custom OpenID Connect claim for specifying user groups.

issuerURL.description: The URL of the OpenID issuer, only HTTPS scheme will be accepted.

signingAlgs.description: Comma separated list of allowed JOSE asymmetric signing algorithms, for example, RS256, ES256

usernameClaim.description: The OpenID claim to use as the user name.

usernamePrefix.description: If provided, all usernames will be prefixed with this value. If not provided, username claims other than 'email' are prefixed by the issuer URL to avoid clashes. To skip any prefixing, provide the value '-' (dash character without additional characters).

additionalWorkerNodePools.description: Specifies the list of additional worker node pools.

_enumDisplayName.Ignore: Ignore - module resource is not created.

customResourcePolicy.description: Select your preferred CustomResourcePolicy setting or leave this field empty.

name.description: Check a module technical name on this website. You can only use a module technical name once.
name.title: Name

clientID.description: The client ID for the OpenID Connect client.

groupsClaim.description: If provided, the name of a custom OpenID Connect claim for specifying user groups.

issuerURL.description: The URL of the OpenID issuer, only HTTPS scheme will be accepted.

signingAlgs.description: Comma separated list of allowed JOSE asymmetric signing algorithms, for example, RS256, ES256

usernameClaim.description: The OpenID claim to use as the user name.

usernamePrefix.description: If provided, all usernames will be prefixed with this value. If not provided, username claims other than 'email' are prefixed by the issuer URL to avoid clashes. To skip any prefixing, provide the value '-' (dash character without additional characters).
